mapper.insert: insert into product( id, name, price, categoryid, pnum, imgurl, description ) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{price}, #{category.id}, #{pnum}, #{imgurl}, #{description} )
mapper.update:
update product
name=#{name},
price=#{price},
categoryid= #{category.id},
pnum=#{pnum},
description=#{description},
imgurl=#{imgurl},
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select p.id, p.name, price, categoryid, pnum, imgurl, description,c.id as category_id,c.name as category_name from product p inner join category c on p.categoryid=c.id where p.id=#{id}

select p.id, p.name, price, categoryid, pnum, imgurl, description,c.id as category_id,c.name as category_name from product p inner join category c on p.categoryid=c.id
limit #{start},#{rows}

select p.id,p.name,price,categoryid,pnum,imgurl, description,c.id as category_id,c.name as category_name from product p inner join category c on p.categoryid=c.id where p.name like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
select count(*) from product p inner join category c on p.categoryid=c.id
